hero.description: Where tradition meets innovation. Crafting high-performance soles with cutting-edge technology and artisanal expertise for the global footwear industry.

product.description: Tailor-made soles for every need, designed to combine functionality, comfort, and style, adaptable to all types of footwear, from technical to fashion.

materials.title: Soles for every style, function, and material
materials.description: PBS Soles Srl offers a wide range of soles for footwear, ensuring the perfect balance between innovation and tradition. Thanks to flexible production, we also manufacture custom soles in small quantities.

cork.name: Agglomerated cork
cork.description: A natural material for eco-friendly solutions.

flatHeelSoles.title: Soles Flat heel
flatHeelSoles.description: Postural comfort, flat heel and durability.

aboutLegacy.subtitle: Rooted in tradition, always looking toward the future

2018.description: PBS Soles Srl was founded 7 years ago, originally producing wooden soles with traditional craftsmanship methods.

2020.description: Growing demand for cork led the company to invest in revolutionary new technologies and expand production capabilities.

2022.description: Advanced materials like EVA, microporous compounds, and rubber became essential. We upgraded all machinery for top-quality production.

today.description: A market leader combining industrial production with artisanal quality, powered by innovation and skilled expertise.

expertise.title: 5+ Years of Expertise
expertise.description: Our company takes pride in a team of highly skilled professionals dedicated to excellence in sole manufacturing. With decades of acquired expertise, we master the art of blending materials and technologies to create diverse, customized solutions tailored to each customer's unique requirements.

innovation.title: Innovative Technology
innovation.description: Through extensive research and development, we've pioneered advanced systems that significantly reduce the weight of TR, TPU, and PU soles. Our cutting-edge technology delivers distinctive benefits, creating footwear solutions that prioritize lightweight design, superior performance, and exceptional comfort.

flexibility.title: Flexible Order Solutions
flexibility.description: At PBS Soles, we understand diverse client needs and welcome orders of all sizes. With over 20 years of expertise in sole production, we're committed to delivering premium products regardless of order volume. From small batches of 100 pairs to large-scale production, expect efficient service, timely delivery, and unwavering quality.

description.paragraph1: As a growing company, we believe in the perfect balance between modern technology and traditional handcrafted techniques. Our approach ensures each sole is crafted with precision and passion.
description.paragraph2: 50% of our production remains handcrafted - a unique advantage that allows us to handle custom orders, create prototypes, and produce limited-edition collections with unmatched flexibility and quality.
description.paragraph3: Every sole is designed in collaboration with designers and manufacturers, combining functionality, style, and superior materials. Our attention to detail ensures industrial efficiency with artisanal excellence.

contact.title: Let's Start a Conversation
contact.subtitle: Ready to elevate your footwear? Reach out today and discover how our expertise can bring your vision to life.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.subtitle: Fill out the form and we'll get back to you shortly

footer.description: Crafting premium shoe soles with 10 years of expertise. Where tradition meets innovation in every step.

hero.subtitle: A legacy of innovation, quality, and dedication to the art of sole manufacturing. From our humble beginnings to becoming a global leader, our story is one of passion and perseverance.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To deliver exceptional shoe soles that combine traditional craftsmanship with modern innovation, exceeding client expectations through quality, flexibility, and personalized service.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the global benchmark for sole manufacturing excellence, recognized for our commitment to sustainability, innovation, and the perfect balance of industrial efficiency with artisanal quality.

promise.title: Our Promise
promise.description: Every sole tells a story of dedication, precision, and care. We promise consistent quality, reliable partnerships, and solutions that help bring your footwear visions to life.

timeline.subtitle: Seven decades of evolution, innovation, and unwavering commitment to excellence

2018.title: Foundation
2018.description: Started as a small workshop producing handcrafted wooden soles

2020.title: Cork Innovation
2020.description: Expanded into cork sole production with new technologies

2022.title: Material Revolution
2022.description: Introduced EVA, microporous compounds, and rubber materials

today.title: Industry Leader
today.description: Combining industrial scale with artisanal quality

values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

quality.title: Passion for Quality
quality.description: Every sole we produce reflects our commitment to excellence and craftsmanship that has defined us for over 7 years.

trust.title: Trust & Reliability
trust.description: Building lasting relationships with our clients through consistent quality and dependable service every single time.

innovation.title: Innovation Drive
innovation.description: Constantly evolving with cutting-edge technology while honoring traditional craftsmanship techniques.

customer.title: Customer Focus
customer.description: Your success is our mission. We tailor solutions to meet your unique requirements with precision and care.

team.subtitle: Talented professionals dedicated to your success

cta.subtitle: Let's create something extraordinary. Reach out today and discover how our expertise can elevate your footwear brand.
